name: David-Viet Nguyen
summary: My goal is to build a long-term career in the information technology field with opportunities for career growth. I am looking for employment with a company or institution that offers me a positive atmosphere to learn new technologies and allow me to apply my assets for the betterment of the business.

experience.title: Sr Technical Support Consultant
responsibilities: Troubleshoot and resolved software deployment and licensing problems for AspenTech's proprietary software
Maintained customer service by tracking customer incidents through Salesforce
Authored technical white papers for AspenTech's web knowledgebase
Assisted sales team in managing customer relationships
Deployed AspenTech solutions in customer business environments
Managed AspenTech's training platforms, CloudShare/Azure Labs, and maintained virtual machines
accomplishments: Conducted over 50 pre-sales product demos with 75% contract closure rate
Successfully deployed AspenTech solutions in over 20 customer business environments with 95% success rate
Led post-OPTIMIZE 21 training with 1,000 customers participating (5x increase from previous year)
Deployed User Certification Program with 2000 users taking online exams and 1500 certified users
Nearly 1,000 users posted digital badges on social media

experience.title: IT Support Technician
responsibilities: Administered and maintained computer networks and related computing environments
Configured security settings and permissions for network access, internet web filtering, and electronic health records
Created and edited company website content
Collaborated in transitioning to centrally managed antivirus solution
Conducted regular data backups and disaster recovery tests
accomplishments: Ensured optimal performance and uptime of computing environments
Maintained data security and regulatory compliance
Improved efficiency and security of IT operations through system implementations

education.institution: University of Houston, C.T. Bauer College of Business
